description: Colorize a ranked digraph with a range of colors. Graphviz filters: acyclic, bcomps, comps, edgepaint, gvcolor, gvpack, mingle, nop, sccmap, tred, & unflatten. More information: https://graphviz.org/pdf/gvcolor.1.pdf.

useCases.description: Colorize one or more ranked digraph (that were already processed by dot):
Lay out a graph and colorize it, then convert to a PNG image:
